itunes:title: When Parents Separate
title: When Parents Separate
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: Janet receives a letter from a mom who’s been sep…
itunes:summary:
Janet receives a letter from a mom who’s been separated from her husband for six weeks and is about to make the arrangement permanent. She wonders how much, and how best to communicate with her four-year-old about the situation and how to handle the changes in their lives.

"Sessions" is Janet's exclusive collection of private phone consultations with parents. Check out episodes here: SessionsAudio.com

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
